name: Slime Universe Mobile
description:
Slime Universe Mobile
is a parallax based runner where your goal is to kill the enemy red slimes and collect as many points as you can. Find mystery boxes filled with points, shields, and ray guns! Keep updated with us at Oasis Games because this is the first game in the Slime Universe series and we are going to be launching Slime Versus, an ultimate one vs one multiplayer arena, very soon!

Controls:
[Space] Jump
[Enter] Shoot
